String.toolTip: A Mysterium group dedicated to unlocking the secrets of defeating the argons in Val Tirkai.
A unit of irregular forces engaged in operations against the argons on the front lines.
A loose fraternity of soldiers, mercenaries, and hunters who love big game and have taken the battle to the argons.
Followers of the principles of Hyderad, who work to preserve the past and protect the environment.
A secret coalition of merchants and soldiers who look after the city's best interests and act on its behalf.
An elite team of scholars dedicated to unlocking the secrets behind the nexuses.
A research organization of mages and engineers researching to combine magic and mechanical engineering.
A merchant guild committed to thriving commerce, by any means necessary.
The Vanguard Initiative is the Valkyon Federation's effort to uncover the secrets of Northern Arun.
Gained by completing Ace Dungeons.
An elite group of federation soldiers who tackle major threats to the Valkyon Federation.
The Anti-Amber Operations are the Valkyon Federation's efforts to unravel the recent crystallization phenomenon.
The Anti-Amber Operations are the Valkyon Federation's efforts to unravel the recent crystallization phenomenon.
The Anti-Amber Operations are the Valkyon Federation's efforts to unravel the recent crystallization phenomenon.
A Naga force resisting the Draakons.
A team dispatched from the federation to explore and research Exodor.
A force unlike anything else in this world
The true champions of the battlegrounds.
Fighters who dominate the battleground, seething with bloodlust.
The true champions of the battlegrounds.
Fighters who dominate the battleground, seething with bloodlust.
Those who seek fame and fortune through noctenium regardless of alliance.
